   19: %%
   20: -module(ssl_mfl_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   23: 
   24: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: -include("ssl_record.hrl").
   27: 
   28: %% Common test
   29: -export([all/0,
   30:          groups/0,
   31:          init_per_suite/1, 
   32:          init_per_group/2, 
   33:          init_per_testcase/2,
   34:          end_per_suite/1,
   35:          end_per_group/2,
   36:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   37: 
   38: %% Testcases
   39: -export([client_option/1, 
   40:          server_option/1, 
   41:          reuse_session/1,
   42:          handshake_continue/1]).
   43: 
   44: %% export for use in ssl_test_lib
   45: -export([assert_mfl_and_send_first/3, 
   46:          assert_mfl_and_recv_first/3]).
   47: 
   48: -define(SLEEP, 500).
   49: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   50: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   51: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   52: 
   53: all() ->
   54:     [{group, 'tlsv1.3'},
   55:      {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
   56:      {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
   57:      {group, 'tlsv1'},
   58:      {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
   59:      {group, 'dtlsv1'}].
   60: 
   61: groups() ->
   62:     [{'tlsv1.3', [], common_tests()},
   63:      {'tlsv1.2', [], common_tests() ++ pre_tls_1_3()},
   64:      {'tlsv1.1', [], common_tests() ++ pre_tls_1_3()},
   65:      {'tlsv1', [], common_tests() ++ pre_tls_1_3()},
   66:      {'dtlsv1.2', [], common_tests() ++ pre_tls_1_3()},
   67:      {'dtlsv1', [], common_tests() ++ pre_tls_1_3()}
   68:     ].
   69: 
   70: common_tests() ->
   71:     [client_option, server_option, handshake_continue].
   72: 
   73: pre_tls_1_3() ->
   74:     [reuse_session].
   75: 
   76: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   77:     Config1 = ssl_test_lib:init_per_suite(Config0, openssl),
   78:     Config = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config1),
   79:     ssl_test_lib:cert_options(Config).
   80: 
   81: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   82:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_suite(Config).
   83: 
   84: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
   85:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName, Config).
   86: 
   87: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
   88:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
   89: 
   90: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   91:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
   92:     Config.
   93: 
   94: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   95:     Config.
   96: 
   97: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   98: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
   99: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  100: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  101: %% check max_fragment_length option on the client is accepted
  102: %% and both sides can successfully send > MFL
  103: client_option(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  104:     ok = run_mfl_handshake(Config,  512),
  105:     ok = run_mfl_handshake(Config, 1024),
  106:     ok = run_mfl_handshake(Config, 2048),
  107:     ok = run_mfl_handshake(Config, 4096),
  108:     ok = run_mfl_handshake(Config, undefined),
  109:     ok.
  110: 
  111: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  112: %% check default max_fragment_length both sides can successfully send > 512 bytes
  113: server_option(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  114:     Data = "mfl_server_options " ++ lists:duplicate(512, $x),
  115:     run_mfl_handshake(Config, undefined, Data, [], []).
  116: 
  117: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  118: %% check max_fragment_length option on the client is accepted and reused
  119: reuse_session(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  120:     MFL = 512,
  121:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config) ++
  122:         [{max_fragment_length, MFL}],
  123:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  124: 
  125:     ssl_test_lib:reuse_session(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  126: 
  127: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  128: handshake_continue(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  129:     ok = run_mfl_handshake_continue(Config, 1024),
  130:     ok = run_mfl_handshake_continue(Config, undefined),
  131:     ok.
  132: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  133: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
  134: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  135: run_mfl_handshake(Config, MFL) when is_integer(MFL) ->
  136:     Data = "hello world" ++ lists:duplicate(MFL, $0),
  137:     ClientExtraOpts = [{max_fragment_length, MFL}],
  138:     run_mfl_handshake(Config, MFL, Data, ClientExtraOpts, []);
  139: run_mfl_handshake(Config, MFL) ->
  140:     Data = "hello world" ++ lists:duplicate(512, $9),
  141:     ClientExtraOpts = [],
  142:     run_mfl_handshake(Config, MFL, Data, ClientExtraOpts, []).
  143: 
  144: run_mfl_handshake(Config, MFL, Data, ClientExtraOpts, ServerExtraOpts) ->
  145:     run_mfl_handshake(Config, MFL, Data, ClientExtraOpts, ServerExtraOpts, 
  146:                       [], [], fun(_,_) -> ok end).
  147: 
  148: run_mfl_handshake(Config, MFL, Data, ClientExtraOpts, ServerExtraOpts, 
  149:                   ClientExtraStartOpts, ServerExtraStartOpts,
  150:                   PostFun) ->
  151:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  152:     ClientOpts = ClientExtraOpts ++ ClientOpts0,
  153:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  154:     ServerOpts = ServerExtraOpts ++ ServerOpts0,
  155: 
  156:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  157:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  158:                     {from, self()},
  159:                     {mfa, {?MODULE, assert_mfl_and_send_first, [MFL, Data]}},
  160:                     {options, ServerOpts} | ServerExtraStartOpts]),
  161: 
  162:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  163:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  164:                {host, Hostname},
  165:                {from, self()},
  166:                {mfa, {?MODULE, assert_mfl_and_recv_first, [MFL, Data]}},
  167:                {options, ClientOpts} | ClientExtraStartOpts]),
  168: 
  169:     ok = PostFun(Server, Client),
  170: 
  171:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
  172: 
  173: run_mfl_handshake_continue(Config, MFL) ->
  174:     Data = if is_integer(MFL) ->
  175:                    "hello world" ++ lists:duplicate(MFL, $u);
  176:               true ->
  177:                    "hello world" ++ lists:duplicate(999, $x)
  178:            end,
  179:     ClientExtraOpts = [{handshake, hello}, {max_fragment_length, MFL}],
  180:     ServerExtraOpts = [{handshake, hello}],
  181:     ExtraStartOpts = [{continue_options, [{want_ext, self()}]}],
  182:     MflEnum = mfl_enum(MFL),
  183:     PostF = fun(Server, Client) ->
  184:                     receive {Server, {ext, ServerExt}} ->
  185:                             ?CT_LOG("Server handshake Ext ~p~n", [ServerExt]),
  186:                             MflEnum = maps:get(max_frag_enum, ServerExt, undefined)
  187:                     end,
  188:                     receive {Client, {ext, ClientExt}} ->
  189:                             ?CT_LOG("Client handshake Ext ~p~n", [ClientExt]),
  190:                             case maps:get(server_hello_selected_version, ClientExt, undefined) of
  191:                                 ?TLS_1_3 ->
  192:                                     %% For TLS 1.3 the ssl {handshake, hello} API is inconsistent:
  193:                                     %% the server gets all the extensions CH+EE, but the client only CH
  194:                                     ignore;
  195:                                 _ ->
  196:                                     MflEnum = maps:get(max_frag_enum, ClientExt, undefined)
  197:                             end
  198:                     end,
  199:                     ok
  200:             end,
  201: 
  202:     run_mfl_handshake(Config, MFL, Data, ClientExtraOpts, ServerExtraOpts, 
  203:                       ExtraStartOpts, ExtraStartOpts, PostF).
  204: 
  205: assert_mfl_and_send_first(Socket, MFL, Data) ->
  206:     ssl_test_lib:assert_mfl(Socket, MFL),
  207:     ssl_send(Socket, Data),
  208:     ssl_receive(Socket, "Got it"++lists:reverse(Data)).
  209: 
  210: assert_mfl_and_recv_first(Socket, MFL, Data) ->
  211:     ssl_test_lib:assert_mfl(Socket, MFL),
  212:     ssl_receive(Socket, Data),
  213:     ssl_send(Socket, lists:reverse(Data)).
  214: 
  215: ssl_send(Socket, Data) ->
  216:     ssl:send(Socket, Data).
  217: 
  218: ssl_receive(Socket, Data) ->
  219:     ssl_receive(Socket, Data, []).
  220: 
  221: ssl_receive(Socket, Data, Buffer) ->
  222:     receive
  223:         {ssl, Socket, MoreData} ->
  224:             ?CT_LOG("Received ~p~n",[MoreData]),
  225:             NewBuffer = Buffer ++ MoreData,
  226:             case NewBuffer of
  227:                 Data ->
  228:                     ssl:send(Socket, "Got it"),
  229:                     ok;
  230:                 _ ->
  231:                     ssl_receive(Socket, Data, NewBuffer)
  232:             end;
  233:         Other ->
  234:             ct:fail({unexpected_message, Other})
  235:     after 4000 ->
  236:             ct:fail({did_not_get, Data})
  237:     end.
  238: 
  239: %% RFC 6066
  240: mfl_enum(512) -> 1;
  241: mfl_enum(1024) -> 2;
  242: mfl_enum(2048) -> 3;
  243: mfl_enum(4096) -> 4;
  244: mfl_enum(undefined) -> undefined.
